displayName: Ensure that Network Security Groups Redis port 6379 access is restricted from the internet
rationale: The potential security problem with using Redis port 6379 over the Internet is that attackers can use various brute force techniques to gain access to Azure Virtual Machines. Once the attackers gain access, they can use a virtual machine as a launch point for compromising other machines on the Azure Virtual Network or even attack networked devices outside of Azure.
recommended_action:
Disable direct Redis port 6379 access to your Azure Virtual Machines from the Internet. After direct
Redis port 6379 access from the Internet is disabled, you have other options you can use to access these
virtual machines for remote management:
Point-to-site VPN
Site-to-site VPN
ExpressRoute
error_message: Security group allows ingress to Redis port 6379
ruleNames: Security group allows ingress to service management port
